How to Measure AI ROI in 2026

A Complete Guide to Calculating Return on Investment for AI Agents

Why ROI Matters

AI investments can be substantial. Understanding ROI helps you justify costs and optimize spending.

Key Metrics to Track

  • Time Saved: Hours saved per task × hourly rate
  • Quality Improvement: Reduction in errors × cost per error
  • Revenue Impact: Additional revenue generated
  • Cost Reduction: Expenses eliminated

ROI Calculation Formula

ROI = ((Gain - Cost) / Cost) × 100%

Real ROI Examples

Content Creation: 80% time savings = $4,000/month value
Customer Support: 50% cost reduction = $2,500/month saved
Data Entry: 90% automation = $1,200/month saved
